update.description:
[This](http://osrf-distributions.s3.amazonaws.com/gazebo/api/dev/classgazebo_1_1gui_1_1EntityMaker.html) is the current structure:

![makers.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3750000366-makers.png)

This is the one introduced in this pull request:

![makers2.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/601007612-makers2.png)

This pull request is mainly addressing issue #66, and also fixes issue #1583.

* Removed `MeshMaker` and `g_meshCreateAct` because they are not used and similar functionality has been moved to the Model Editor.

* Removed `BoxMaker`, `CylinderMaker` and `SphereMaker` because they had only one function being used. That common function became `ModelMaker::InitSimpleShape`, which takes the new enum `SimpleShapes`.

* `BuildingMaker` is not derived from `EntityMaker` anymore, as it shared very little with the rest of the makers.

* All makers now use the same `MouseMove` and `MouseRelease` from the `EntityMaker` base class. Removed `MouseDrag` and `MousePush` since they were not used.

* Snapping to grid has been centralized in the `ModelManipulator` and the hotkeys are all consistent now (issue #1583).

* PIMPLized makers

* Added `ModelMaker_TEST` and `LightMaker_TEST`.
update.title: Makers refactoring

update.description:
Check this [diagram](http://osrf-distributions.s3.amazonaws.com/gazebo/api/dev/classgazebo_1_1gui_1_1EntityMaker.html) for an overview of the current makers.

This pull request is mainly addressing issue #66, and also fixes issue #1583.

* Removed `MeshMaker` and `g_meshCreateAct` because they are not used and similar functionality has been moved to the Model Editor.

* Removed `BoxMaker`, `CylinderMaker` and `SphereMaker` because they had only one function being used. That common function became `ModelMaker::InitSimpleShape`, which takes the new enum `SimpleShapes`.

* `BuildingMaker` is not derived from `EntityMaker` anymore, as it shared very little with the rest of the makers.

* All makers now use the same `MouseMove` and `MouseRelease` from the `EntityMaker` base class. Removed `MouseDrag` and `MousePush` since they were not used.

* Snapping to grid has been centralized in the `ModelManipulator` and the hotkeys are all consistent now (issue #1583).

* PIMPLized makers

* Added `ModelMaker_TEST` and `LightMaker_TEST`.
